item.description:
Moved this meetup to 19th september - the track is closed today because the staff are out doing some charity event. Hopefully more people might be able to make it.

Let's race at the F1 Outdoor track. The pricing is below. If it rains, we'll race at their indoor track at Braintree. Stay tuned for emails from me if the weather looks iffy - otherwise send me your phone number if you would like to be notified by text message or voice call

Pricing:
1 race - $28 plus license fee
3 race pack - $75 + license fee
4 race pack - $85 + license fee

Open lapping - 1/2 hour - $70 (requires competition license)

License Fees
F1 outdoors license is separate from F1 indoors license
Day license $10 ($5 with F1 Indoors Annual license)
Annual license $15 ($10 with F1 Indoors Annual license)
Competition license $55 ($45 with F1 Indoors Competition license)
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the registration hut
item.name: F1 Outdoors Meetup
